item.title: Trump-backed crypto regulation bills fail to clear key hurdle in Congress
item.description: Republicans who voted against the cryptocurrency regulation legislation objected to how the bills were structured.

item.title: Trump administration ends Polymarket investigations without charges
item.description: Closure of the criminal and civil probes come months after FBI agents seized a cellphone and other electronic devices of Polymarket CEO Shayne Coplan.

item.title: Trump says Indonesia trade deal features 19% tariff; Jakarta yet to confirm
item.description: Trump in a Truth Social post called it "great deal, for everybody," and said it followed direct dealings with Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto.

item.title: Elon Musk looms over jury selection in Tesla Autopilot fatality trial
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk served for months as a top advisor to President Donald Trump before the two billionaires fell out.

item.title: Trump's 30% tariff letter leaves EU scrambling to bring U.S. on side
item.description: European Union leaders have said they are still working towards reaching a negotiated solution with the U.S.
